title: Iron-Gold - GGLoL 5v5 Tournament #2

embed.description: Welcome once more to Gaming Gurus' Iron - Gold Tournament! Sign up with a pre-made team or as a free agent and do battle...

body:
Hey guys :)

Me and my tournament organisers are hosting another event in Gaming Gurus discord community, anyone is welcome to come join the fun, please search through the link for any information regarding the discord link and tournament information.

Time and date,
27/07 Saturday, 3PM Syd/Melb AEST.

Hope to see some of you there!
Mark

replies.body: Hi I have no team and I want to play
Reply here before adding me so I can reinstall the game lol
